description: meta info used by the TURBOMOLE parser, all names are expected to start with x_turbomole_

metaInfos.description: The label of the atoms in the system
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_atom_label

metaInfos.description: The number of atoms in the system
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_atom_number

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_basis_status

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_cartesian_status

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_dipole_status

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_global_status

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_hessian_status

metaInfos.description: Status mean here ON or OFF
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_interconversion_status

metaInfos.description: The kind of operating system
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_operating_system

metaInfos.description: The given symmetry of the system
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlIn_symmetry

metaInfos.description: The integration cells
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_integration_cells

metaInfos.description: type of the used grid integration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_integration

metaInfos.description: Type of the partition function used
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_partition_func

metaInfos.description: Sharpness of the partition function
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_partition_sharpness

metaInfos.description: Grid points number
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_points_number

metaInfos.description: The size of the radial grid
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_radial_grid_size

metaInfos.description: The radial integration type
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_radial_integration

metaInfos.description: The size of the used grid
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_controlInOut_grid_size

metaInfos.description: Damping of the two-electron contributions to Fock matrix in the present SCF iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_damping_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: change of the eigenvalues in the current SCF iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_delta_eigenvalues

metaInfos.description: version of the DFT-D3 van-der-Waals correction that is used
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_dft_d3_version

metaInfos.description: Correlation energy at a given eigenstate from perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_correlation_perturbativeGW

metaInfos.description: Exact exchange energy at given eigenstate from perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_ExactExchange_perturbativeGW

metaInfos.description: Self-energy at a given eigenstate from perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_ExchangeCorrelation_perturbativeGW

metaInfos.description: KS exchange correlation energy at a given eigenstate needed to calculate the quasi-particle energy in perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_ks_ExchangeCorrelation

metaInfos.description: KS ground state energy at a given eigenstate needed in perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_ks_GroundState

metaInfos.description: Quasiparticle energy at a given eigenstate from perturbative GW
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalue_quasiParticle_energy

metaInfos.description: Irreducible representation the eigenstates belong to.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_eigenvalues_irreducible_representation

metaInfos.description: Total energy contribution from one-electron integrals
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_energy_1electron_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total energy contribution from two-electron integrals
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_energy_2electron_scf_iteration

metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_ExchangeCorrelation_perturbativeGW_derivation

metaInfos.description: type of the used correlation functional
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_functional_type_correlation

metaInfos.description: type of the used exchange functional
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_functional_type_exchange

metaInfos.description: By default Turbomole only keeps the output of the final iteration once the geometry has been converged, thus the entire optimization trajectory cannot be rebuild in most cases. Instead, this value contains the optimization cycle index to indicate how many iterations have preceded this one.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_cycle_index

metaInfos.description: geometry optimization convergence criterion - Root Mean Square of displacements
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_geometry_change_rms

metaInfos.description: geometry optimization convergence criterion - Root Mean Square of forces
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_threshold_force_rms

metaInfos.description: geometry optimization trust region - initial radius
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_trustregion_initial

metaInfos.description: geometry optimization trust region - maximum radius
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_trustregion_max

metaInfos.description: geometry optimization trust region - minimum radius
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_geometry_optimization_trustregion_min

metaInfos.description: The employed GW approximation.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_gw_approximation

metaInfos.description: [TO BE VERIFIED]Infinitesimal complex energy shift. Negative value switches to calculating at that value but extrapolating to 0 in linear approximation.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_gw_eta_factor

metaInfos.description: If true, the pure RPA response function is calculated. Otherwise, the TDDFT response function is calculated and used to screen the coulomb interaction.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_gw_use_rpa_response

metaInfos.description: The name of the Turbomole module used for this single configuration calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_module

metaInfos.description: compute node
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_nodename

metaInfos.description: Norm of the DIIS error in an SCF-iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_norm_diis_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: orbital with the largest residual norm for the Fia block in this iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_norm_fia_orbital_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Maximal resid. norm for Fia-block in an SCF-iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_norm_fia_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: orbital with the largest residual Fock norm in this iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_norm_fock_orbital_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Maximal resid. fock norm in an SCF-iteration
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_norm_fock_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Charges of the point charges in the unit cell used by the PCEEM embedding model
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_pceem_charges

metaInfos.description: Maximum multipole moment used in the PCEEM embedding
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_pceem_max_multipole

metaInfos.description: Minimum separation between cells in PCEEM embedding for periodic fast multipole treatment
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_pceem_min_separation_cells

metaInfos.description: Multipole precision parameter for PCEEM embedding
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_pceem_multipole_precision

metaInfos.description: Final potential energy
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_potential_energy_final

metaInfos.description: section for the eigenvalues of a GW calculation (at present only pertubative G0W0)
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_section_eigenvalues_GW

metaInfos.description: section for one list of XC functionals
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_section_functionals

metaInfos.description: Type of UHF molecular orbital
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_uhfmo_type

metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_vibrations_normal_modes

metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_vibrations_num_modes

metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_virial_theorem

metaInfos.description: Final Wave Function Norm
metaInfos.name: x_turbomole_wave_func_norm
